## Overview

This page provides an overview of active research projects in the Rashid Lab. All project repositories are hosted in the [rashidlab GitHub organization](https://github.com/rashidlab).

::: {.callout-tip}
## Finding Projects
Use [GitHub Topics](https://github.com/rashidlab?q=topic:student-project) to filter repositories:

- All student projects: [`topic:student-project`](https://github.com/rashidlab?q=topic:student-project)
- By student: [`topic:tylerbhumpherys`](https://github.com/rashidlab?q=topic:tylerbhumpherys)
- By area: [`topic:clinical-trials`](https://github.com/rashidlab?q=topic:clinical-trials)
:::

## Creating a New Project

1. **Choose a template** from the list above
2. **Create repository** using "Use this template" on GitHub
3. **Follow naming convention**: `{github-username}-{project-name}`
4. **Add topics** for discoverability
5. **Update this page** with your project info

See [Repository Organization](../policies/repository-organization.qmd) for detailed guidelines.

## Project Status Legend

| Status | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| **Planning** | Early stage, defining scope |
| **Active** | Under active development |
| **Writing** | Analysis complete, writing manuscript |
| **Submitted** | Manuscript under review |
| **Published** | Work is published |
| **Archived** | Project complete, repo archived |
